candidates.why: Closest top-level coordinator analogue: analyze -> recommend chain -> confirm -> sequential execution + state persistence.
Main workflow orchestrator; defines minimum execution units and chain execution model used by coordinators.
Coordinator-style command with staged workflow and strategy selection (planning unit).
Similar multi-step coordinator pattern with explicit validation and tool-gated execution.
Representative chain element; provides argument patterns and artifact expectations for planning steps.

selected.why: Strongest match on interaction model, orchestration responsibilities, and state persistence.
